name: App academy work
tagline: A collection of App Academy work
body:
### Welcome to my App Academy Repo
This is a collection of all the work I did during app academy. A couple of notes: 

* This work was done during a 9 week period. 
* This work is meant to be scavenged. 
* This work is meant to show *progress* from week 1 to week 9. 
* Please clone this and run the code. 

If you are an avant-garde employer: 

*Ask me an interview question by creating an issue.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
